org.apache.flex.compiler.filespecs

Class BaseFileSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.filespecs.BaseFileSpecification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFileSpecification
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSpecification

    public abstract class BaseFileSpecification
extends Object
implements IFileSpecification
    Base class for all IFileSpecifications, which has a file path and knows how to perform basic operations with it.

        public boolean isOpenDocument()
        Specified by:
        isOpenDocument in interface IFileSpecification
        Returns:
